name: No Match for a Ghost
description:
No Match for a Ghost is a small puzzle game made for the VR Game Jam 2022. 

You, a private detective, get called on a stormy night for a job. Upon arriving you will meet a mischievous ghost that shuts down the power. You only have limited time matches that are scattered around the level to solve the mystery and “help” the ghost.

Credits:

Music: Bittersweet by Kevin MacLeod. Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/3440-bittersweet. License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license. Artist website: https://incompetech.com/
